page.title: 11The Pyewipe
page.content: The Pyewipe Inn is situated by the Fossdyke canal and the railway. An elevated section of the Lincoln by_pass passes within one hundred yards. Access to the inn by road is along a narrow single track road leading off the A57 road alternatively there is a footpath leading out from the City of Lincoln along the bank of the Fossdyke canal. They have a varied menu and also have a room set aside for dancing and wedding receptions. There is also an adventure playground for children. It is a very popular place especially during the summer months when customers can eat and drink outside by the Fossdyke canal.
